posts.title: 카카오톡 API 사용하기
posts.text: 카카오톡 API 사용하기공유하기 // 사용할 앱의 JavaScript 키를 설정해 주세요. Kakao.init('b0316a3e96f338874d6a2d8a1a6aeb3a'); var opts = { container: '#kakao-link-btn', objectType: 'feed', content: { title: '카톡공유 테스트', imageUrl: 'https://mkref.github.io/css/images/logo-header.png', link: { webUrl: 'https://mkref.github.io/2017/08/21/use-kakaotalk-api/', mobileWebUrl: 'https://mkref.github.io/2017/08/21/use-kakaotalk-api/' }, description: '모바일에서 카카오톡 공유하기를 테스트 합니다.', imageWidth: 165, imageHeight: 100 }, buttonTitle: '게시물 바로가기', installTalk: true, success: function(msg) { alert(msg); } }; Kakao.Link.createDefaultButton(opts);

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
